semantics.label: Alternative text for background image
semantics.description: If the browser can't load the image this text will be displayed instead. Also used by assistive technologies.

semantics.label: Hotspot label for assistive technologies
semantics.description: Will help announce what hotspot element has been navigated to if there is no header specified for a hotspot. #num can be used to replace the hotspot number.
